name: Layla RPG Agent
description: An RPG game agent that allows you to play a text-based adventure game through Layla. Explore locations, fight enemies, and track your character stats!

toolsData.name: RPG Server Request
toolsData.description: Makes HTTP requests to the RPG server. Available endpoints: /describe_location (GET), /get_stats (GET), /attack (POST with target), /move (POST with location), /new_game (POST), /inventory (GET), /enemies (GET), /save_game (POST), /load_game (POST), /saved_games (GET)

parameters.url: Construct the appropriate URL based on the user's command. Base URL is http://localhost:3000. For movement use /move, for combat use /attack, for stats use /get_stats, for looking around use /describe_location, etc.
parameters.method: Use GET for info requests (stats, location, inventory, enemies, saved games) and POST for actions (attack, move, new game, save)
parameters.body: For POST requests, include the required JSON body. For attack: {"target": "enemy_name"}, for move: {"location": "location_name"}, for save: {"saveName": "save_name"}, etc.

toolsData.name: Provide Context
toolsData.description: Provides RPG game context to the conversation
